Articles.Content:
What is the closest to the sun you can get? I tried searching the forum with no luck.

Can you aerobreak in the sun?

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerbol

Everything you need shall be on this page Probably, honestly though the wiki is a good source of information for the game.

i think it's like 250k, also do you think it's possibly to aerobreak through super heated gasses hotter then the core of the earth with hundreds of solar flares zooming

through you at the speed of light.
doh, didn't even think to check the wiki. thanks
